programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are at the convenience store considering playing truant. Larry warns them that if they dont take their education seriously theyll end up like him. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, whilst doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. Its actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that Hector is not so happy being giant-sized. So they decide to help him by creating a potion that will shrink him down to the size of an average person. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball vows to wear a shell and partake in strange Fitzgerald traditions, in order to help Penny get through a tense family birthday party with ease.

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. When they find one that depicts Gumball running naked through the mall, Gumball is determined not to let it come to pass. However events conspire against him, and Gumball learns that sometimes you cant fight fate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Rob, his old nemesis, is "neme-seeing" someone else now. Devastated that Rob has fallen out of hate with him, Gumball refuses to accept that his ex-nemesis has moved on and does his best to sabotage Robs blossoming relationship with his new foe, Banana Joe.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball gives Billy his first taste of video-games but the sheer excitement causes him to pass out. His mother Felicity summons the Parent Teacher Association and threatens to ban video games all across Elmore. Gumball and Darwin are given three chances to prove that video games can be a force for good, but when they fail they decide to prove that books can be just as dangerous.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Have Gumball and Darwin finally run out of things to say to each other? / Gumball, Darwin and Banana Joe investigate Banana Barbaras mysterious disappearance and uncover an old rivals shadowy scheme in the process.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When their parents all go to a charity gala at the school, the kids are locked in a classroom with a VHS tape. However, when the room starts to heat up, they need a leader to get them out of the situation and have to choose between Anais, a qualified but unpopular candidate or Gumball, a charismatic candidate with absolutely no plans.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball vows to wear a shell and partake in strange Fitzgerald traditions, in order to help Penny get through a tense family birthday party with ease.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin seek healthy food for their family, but an evil food consortium controls the industry.

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Slime Princess needs a husband or else shell lose the Slime Kingdom to her obnoxious sis. Finn steps in to save the day but first they will need to win a series of love games to prove to Slime Princesss dad that they are really in love.

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Finn meets the Box Prince and the box kingdom.

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: All aboard! Finn and Jake discover a train where every car is a dungeon filled with a new foe for Finn to fight. Jake quickly gets bored and wants to leave, but Finn is having the BEST time and doesnt want to leave... ever!

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Finn, Jake and Marceline are trapped in an underground cavern with no red in sight. If Marceline doesnt feed, like ASAP, she will turn into a vampiric beast and suck out all of Jakes blood! So, Finn heads off to explore the cave and find something red to satiate her until they can be rescued. But time is running out!

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin wants to get back a love letter he wrote to Carrie before she sees it.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. When Gumball objects he is told that even the smallest misdemeanour can lead to a breakdown in law. In an effort to impress the kids Donut Cop takes them for a ride-along in his cop car and gets carried away, progressively breaking the law himself. He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them "procrastinators", once shes told them what it means. They promise to take the trash out by the time she gets home. As the clock slowly counts down, they discover that they will go to extraordinary lengths, no matter how inane, to avoid the task in hand.

programme.desc: Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When they see the school bullies making fun of Sussie Gumball and Darwin decide to try and help her act less weird. They carefully observe her behavior and decide that the only thing they have to change is absolutely everything.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: No matter what Gumball does, Carmen thinks she knows better. Gumball attempts to gain the moral high ground but fails... The only option left is to bring Carmen down to his level. 15 mins, U (2011) (CC)

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard, as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories, it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumballs old BFF, Fuzzy, turns up on his doorstep. Darwin struggles to accept that there was someone before him and fails to contain his jealousy. But is Darwin right to mistrust Fuzzy? Does Fuzzy actually have sinister motives for reconnecting with his old BFF?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins clothes go missing after a swimming lesson, and Gumball is forced to wear a tuxedo from the lost and found office. He believes it makes him look like a certain dapper British secret agent and, together with Darwin and Bobert (and far too many wisecracks) Gumball tracks down the villain responsible for stealing his clothes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When everything goes wrong in Darwins life, he begins to suspect that Gumballs bad influence might be to blame. Darwin decides to go elsewhere for guidance and finds a new mentor in Alan. But maybe its time Darwin started making his own decisions.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Bobert finds hes infected with a virus called love.exe he asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word love. When they try to explain it through song, it gets him no closer to an answer, so he asks the other residents of Elmore to give their versions of what love means to them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin realize that the adult residents of Elmore are dangerously naive when it comes to being safe online. In fact they are in serious need of the boys help with even the simplest of tasks. And no more so than their mom Nicole.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The students of Elmore Junior High find their world turned upside down when the mysterious school superintendent comes to stamp out their cartoonish ways. But who wants to be normal? Certainly not Gumball and Darwin...

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.desc: The Mega Mondo Pop Cartoon-a-Con in sunny California marks the spot for mystery in this all-new original Scooby-Doo adventure! The Mystery Inc. pals -- Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy and Scooby -- head to the annual convention, but theyre not there to crack their next case. They want to meet their favorite comic book characters and see a megabucks movie premiere, an explosive big-screen remake of the classic cartoon The Adventures of Blue Falcon, featuring Shaggy and Scoobys favorite superheroes: caped avenger Blue Falcon and his trusty but bumbling robo-pup, Dynomutt. But when a vindictive 1970s supervillain, Mr. Hyde, who starred in the original series, descends on the convention center and begins wreaking havoc, its up to Scooby and his friends to stop the resurrected evildoer and keep the Con attendees safe.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: When Sticky Joe tries to clip his pet rats nails, it leads to a wild adventure.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. / Gumball is late to meet Penny at the mall, but a series of misunderstandings on the way only delay him further.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball gives Billy his first taste of video-games but the sheer excitement causes him to pass out. His mother Felicity summons the Parent Teacher Association and threatens to ban video games all across Elmore. Gumball and Darwin are given three chances to prove that video games can be a force for good, but when they fail they decide to prove that books can be just as dangerous.

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Finn finds an old truck, and Jake calls Banana Man to help with the repairs. But when BMO stays up all night working on the truck, he hears on a spooky radio talk show that Princess Bubblegum is a reptilian replicant. Is it just another one of Starchys crazy conspiracy theories, or a fact?

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Tree Trunks and Mr. Pig are getting married.

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Sick and tired of babysitting Ice King while the Ice Kingdom is being rebuilt, Finn and Jake call up an old friend to hang out with their annoying houseguest: Abracadaniel. But when Ice King and his new BFF accidentally unleash the demon Kee-Oth, Finn and Jake have to clean up their mess.

programme.title: Seikluste aeg
programme.desc: Kee-Oth the Blood Demon has kidnapped Jake, taken him back to his dimension and thrown him in a pit. If Finn wants to rescue his friend, hes going to need Lady Rainicorns help... and a videotape that will reveal how to open the portal to Kee-Oths messed-up dimension.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin must stop an evil social media app from turning every kid in Elmore into mindless internet-trend-following drone.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally headbutts her and cracks open her shell. They discover that under Pennys shell is an emotional shape-shifting inner self. Pennys father is determined for Penny to keep it hidden but Gumball encourages her to show the world who, or what, she really is.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it, despite Darwins advice. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. When they realise they have left the real Chris Morris at school, they have to race to find him before their error is discovered.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. programme.title: Lamput

When Tom steals the winters supply of nuts from a feisty flying squirrel, things go from bad to worse. Not only does the squirrel take Jerrys stash, but the irate rodent launches an attack on Tom inside the house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen - only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese - including waking up Tom!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch and Meathead dont want to miss a marathon of their favourite show so they make a deal with Tom to trade a little TV time for a treasure map. Of course, Tom and Jerry dont know the map is a fake. Butch and Meathead try to get comfortable while Tom and Jerry must figure out how to circumvent Spike when they realise his house is directly on top of their riches.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, with all the strange, bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its a sleepover! Lil Quacker is going to spend the night over at Jerrys place. Jerrys working double time to keep the fearless duck safe from Tom. When Tyke wants Jerry and Lil Quacker to sleepover in the doghouse, Spike relents. A grateful Jerry drifts off to dreamland but not so fast when the sleepwalking duck goes on a nighttime adventure, Jerry and the gang have to save Lil Quacker from all the nocturnal dangers!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry leads an accident-prone scouting troop, earning badges and creating mayhem for Tom.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: In the run-up to a fundraising event for the Donkey Sanctuary, Irma realises she doesnt have a posh dress, so Mr Bean goes to buy one for her. However, all the dresses are very expensive - but he comes up with a plan. He can buy a dress, then return it after the event provided it still has the label attached. Can Mr Bean protect the dress without Irma realising what hes doing?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece -featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Hes got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Beans heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off so he builds a wind turbine - all fine until theres too much wind! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean is tired of litterbugs and attempts to clean up the whole town himself…with disastrous results. / Mr Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn pest refuses to leave. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mr Bean enters a competition to win a trolley of free food! / Mr Bean meets a soul mate. / Mr Bean makes his own horror movie and ropes in Mrs Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss is writing his new novel but he finds it extremely hard to focus with all the noise and disturbance at the lab. Looking for some tranquillity, Boss finally settles inside the old cannon at launch pad of the lab and accidentally gets fired out all the way to the moon!! Its completely quiet on the moon, just what Boss needs. He cant stop writing. Back at the lab, they build a rocket to bring Boss back! Hopefully boss gets to finish his novel first.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are on holiday and board a high-speed train only to realise that Lamput is also on the same train, except hes in First Class! During the train journey, the Docs try to get from Coach into First Class but are refused entry by the trains Captain. They then disguise themselves as train staff and finally get in, ready to capture the unsuspecting Lamput.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a party boat for Mac and Tosh when Tweety accidentally makes a mistake but doesnt ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders try to help Winston Whale by building him a mail truck, but Winston is used to working alone.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger and Ricks vegetable garden is growing, and they need a way to keep out the gophers. Ginger says traps are cruel, but Tom can handle the task! However, things start getting out of hand when a lady gopher falls in love with Jerry, and the two plan a garden raid together.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Skullie tells Tom that he wont have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry arent inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, theyre disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dogs steps, they chase the fortune cookies trail through town.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spikes lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because its bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out whats going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friends French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon hes practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyones behavior be affected by Sabrinas presence?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Sometimes Mr. Beans Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, its a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages the space station. Amongst the debris that falls in front of the cabin, the Lemmings discover a box that cancels out gravity.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a magicians hat that tosses out objects stored inside beforehand with the tap of a magic wand. He decides to impress his beloved she-bear with a magicians act. But he will have to work around the Lemmings, who have the gift of coming out of the hat at the wrong moment.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A stranger with a diving rod promises to find water for the farm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when the dog next door shows up.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry save King Arthurs kingdom from and evil sorcerer Morgan.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is making pastries at the bakery. He takes Jerry and Tuffy and puts them in the pastries. Tuffy and Jerry both escape and make a pastry of their own, scaring Tom away.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: On vacation in the west with Rick and Ginger Tom and Jerry encounter the legendary Jackalope!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The cat and mouse detective are hired to find a missing rare diamond.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farm hands.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An ancient flying machine is discovered in Postlewaite Manor.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is enjoying his bath time while Jerry bathes Tuffy. Tuffy ends up floating off in a bubble and lands in Toms bath. Jerry throws in all of the bath bombs creating a massive amount of bubbles. In the end, they all work together to get clean.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An oompah land retelling of the Rumplestiltskein story.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: From the security of his treehouse, Tom wages battle with Spike and Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a new bookcase but it is missing one vital element! / Mr Bean takes Teddy on a seaside holiday but a precocious child decides she should be Teddys best and only friend! / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. / Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. Every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it has disappeared. Someone is taking it, but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid. Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies - which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset… until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman - and the mission - are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build an outdoor movie theater in the park. Lola is sick, but she doesnt want to admit it and miss out on all the fun.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When it starts to rain outside, Porky hopes to show The Looney Builders that they can still have fun inside by building a fort.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a castle for Elmer the Giant. They admire his toys and use them without his permission.

programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital. Eggbert has stage fright, but Porky is determined to help him overcome it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse detectives are hired to track down Tuffys imaginary scapegoat Mr. Nobody.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom has trouble keeping track of a pinata full of stolen loot.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman - and the mission - are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When the Witches leave on vacation Toms dreams of rest and relaxation are ruined when their ghost nephew Grayson comes over and throws a giant ghost party. When he steals the witches crystal ball Tom and Jerry must travel into the afterlife to steal it back.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Bigby invents the Asteroid Buster Elite which Jerry uses for fun to destroy asteroids. Tom accidentally gives himself electrical superpowers after causing a power outage. Jerry must fend off Tom while fighting off an asteroid heading right toward their lab.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom eats some canned cheese that has gone bad and hallucinates.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitors car gets damaged Bean thinks hes for the chop.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that its only his landladys furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesnt trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput cant stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure - featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Theres Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that its a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she-bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted, for they want to play helicopter. The butterfly hunt is on!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been strapped with Tom its entire life the talking shadow refuses to go back to the life he once had! When Toms shadow becomes a total nuisance to both Tom and Jerry, they must team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger are taking care of their "adorable" niece for the weekend. When Ginger goes to the store, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the kid safe. Spike takes his new job seriously, swearing nothing will happen to the baby. This, naturally, is where Tom and Jerry arrive to wreak havoc and make Spikes babysitting gig quite possibly his last!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After the witches fly off into the night, Tom chases Jerry into a room full of enchanted bottles. When Jerry tries to hide in one, he inadvertently releases a mischievous thousand-year old genie who grants him three wishes.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom finds Butch having a bath upstairs, he gives him the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around tub isnt the only thing the alley cats left behind because now the house is infested with fleas. Its war as Tom, Jerry and Spike must do something to get rid of these pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a particularly rough cat and mouse fight, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. First, Jerry tries moving in next door but thats where Bruno lives. Jerry settles for the house on the other side of his old digs where a rather large, sedentary cat lives. At first, Jerry enjoys his unfettered access to the kitchen but it has its drawbacks: hes constantly having to expand the opening to his new hole because of his weight gain. He first looks to Spike for companionship but that doesnt end well. Then he actively seeks a new mouse-mate, but theres a lot of crazy mice out there, especially one named Mickey. Then Tom and Jerry catch a glimpse of each other through the windows of their adjacent houses. One thing leads to another and the chase thats been happening for decades, continues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a new bookcase but it is missing one vital element! / Mr Bean takes Teddy on a seaside holiday but a precocious child decides she should be Teddys best and only friend! / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. / Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. Every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it has disappeared. Someone is taking it, but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero "Super Spy" and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bears Scout Camp. With the scout master and mini bus out of action Mr Bean steps in to save the day. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean cannot find anywhere to park other than the space he spots in a schools car park. Theres a case of mistaken identity and Mr Bean finds himself teaching a class of unruly school kids. Bean uses every trick in the book to win them over and ends up teaching the headmaster how to be a success in school.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a lighthouse for Looneyburg, Lolas tablet breaks and she must rely on herself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders redesign the final hole of ACME Acres Mini Golf Course, and Porky is determined to get it just right for the kids.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is enjoying his bath time while Jerry bathes Tuffy. Tuffy ends up floating off in a bubble and lands in Toms bath. Jerry throws in all of the bath bombs creating a massive amount of bubbles. In the end, they all work together to get clean.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerrys high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he cant resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchesss visitor.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom blows on a trumpet to dislodge Jerry from his hiding place, which leads to Frankie the rat convincing Tom hes a great trumpeter. Frankie plays manager, Jerry joins in as percussionist, and they audition neighborhood animals for a third member of their jazz trio. Unfortunately, when Spike is chosen on the upright double bass, rivalries spark up and nerves threaten the trios success.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be oudone Tom starts lifting weights as well which sets up an epic battle royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but hes more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinnys near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. Its kind of Skinnys own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldnt need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder. In seventh heaven, the rodents start over again, this time using the TV satellite dish. But Grizzy, determined to get the dish back at any cost, must confront the magnetism of the meteorite and the fury of the Lemmings, for the rodents are set on playing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a container filled with metal survival food flasks. Primarily filled with vegetables, they do not find favor with the bear, who is more interested in the hi-tech equipment at the rear of the container. Behind his back, the Lemmings find a flask of Yummy and skedaddle with it. But how will they escape Grizzy equipped with his sophisticated gear?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast! But when the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans, Bam helps him realize that even though things didnt go exactly as planned, they still had a great day!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage. As they adapt to their temporary home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of what you have.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batman refuses to engage Joker in a race, Prank goads Bam into a rematch. Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A trip to the woods leads to an unexpected encounter with Big Foot.

programme.desc: Meathead turns into a genius when he gulps down a bottle of specially formulated water.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Duke returns from India with some wild animals that escape their cages and begin to terrorize the manor. Tom is tasked with putting everything back in order.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A stranger with a diving rod promises to find water for the farm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The gang get more than they bargained for when the dog next door shows up.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and the gang are going camping! But as they approach their camp site, Maggie alerts them that a giant solar flare is heading their way. They must turn off all their electronics until the storm subsides.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella is very impressed by Angelie, her moms new field assistant. She especially likes the incredible tricks she does on her surfboard!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and her friends play a star-riddle game that is a tradition in Slippys family. In order to beat Slippys cousins, they need to find some super-giant stars!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys cousin Gem wants time apart from her twin brother I.Lo but he doesnt want to hear it. When no one wants to investigate the super puff planet they discovered, Gem races off on her own, despite the high temperatures and strong winds.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Tilly is dressed as her alter-ego, SuperTilly - the greatest superhero in the universe! When her dad asks her if she can send him his toolbox, its SuperTilly to the rescue!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: When Mole struggles to get everyone to embrace his new-found enthusiasm for forest bathing, he tries to be more assertive like Toad. But the newly confident Mole soon clashes with Toads forceful personality. Can either learn something from the other?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is having a clear out and gives Toad Mr Tiddles, Moles old teddy bear. Once its gone, Mole has second thoughts and wants him back. But the weasels kidnap Mr Tiddles and Mole and Toad have to mount a daring rescue mission to get dear Mr Tiddles back.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Adder sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Moles toffee apple pie but they soon realise she is up to one of her tricks again.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad decides to actually ride his horse Mulberry as both his car and caravan are out of action. But riding a horse requires skills Toad simply hasnt got.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toads violin recital is interrupted by the leaks from his roof. When Toad tries to fix it, he discovers the leaks have given him a musical bonus.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and the gang are going camping! But as they approach their camp site, Maggie alerts them that a giant solar flare is heading their way. They must turn off all their electronics until the storm subsides.

programme.desc: Slippys cousin Gem wants time apart from her twin brother I.Lo but he doesnt want to hear it. When no one wants to investigate the super puff planet they discovered, Gem races off on her own, despite the high temperatures and strong winds.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Tilly is dressed as her alter-ego, SuperTilly - the greatest superhero in the universe! When her dad asks her if she can send him his toolbox, its SuperTilly to the rescue!

programme.title: Toomas ja sõbrad
programme.desc: Nia and Bruno love helping their friends - but now their delivery schedule is overstuffed, the tracks are blocked, and the two of them are stressed out! Bruno helps Nia realize that sometimes its important to schedule a little time for just doing nothing.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Adder sets one riverbanker against the other in order to seize all of Moles toffee apple pie but they soon realise she is up to one of her tricks again.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
